generated_description: escale is a vocational training center located in madrid, community of madrid. the institution offers a variety of courses in both social and technical areas. in the social sector, escale provides training in nursing auxiliary care, socio-sanitary care for dependent individuals, and geriatric auxiliary care. in the technical sector, escale offers courses in thermal installations in buildings, electrical installation, heating installation, air conditioning installation, renewable energy installation, plumbing, and gas installation. the center also provides training in welding and basic electrical installation. escale collaborates with various companies and offers free funding for its courses.
